title: Kaboomblah's tip of the day!
body:
In the latter stages of the game, when you have to manipulate waves:

When there is a big wave you need to answer, clear it quickly and join your team - do not greed for more CS. Done this way, you can join your team for objectives, and your wave will become an absolute monster - which they will have to answer.

It may be counter-intuitive, but if you keep pushing with your minions, you will never create a huge wave because you'll just be pushing your current, tiny wave way too far, way too quickly!

Play more macro!
